TerrainLoader
public class TerrainLoader.Block
extends ResourceLoader.Entry

Describes a section of the terrain. (typically this is an 8x8 set of cells)

get

public TerrainLoader.Block.Cell get(int x,
                                    int y)
                             throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
Gets a cell at the specified coordinates relative to the block.

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate (horizontal) relative to the block
y - the y coordinate (vertical) relative to the block
Returns:
the cell
Throws:
IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the x and y coordinates are not inside the Block.
